name: Stripe Webhooks
description: Handle Stripe payment events including checkout sessions, invoices, and subscription lifecycle events.

name: Twilio Webhooks
description: Process SMS, voice calls, and messaging events from Twilio's communication platform.

name: GitHub Webhooks
description: Respond to repository events like pushes, pull requests, issues, and deployments.

name: AWS S3 Events
description: Handle S3 bucket notifications for object creation, deletion, and replication events.

name: Auth0 Hooks
description: Customize authentication flows with pre and post login, registration, and password reset hooks.

name: Supabase Webhooks
description: Trigger functions on database changes including inserts, updates, and deletes via Postgres triggers.

name: Shopify Webhooks
description: Handle store events including orders, products, customers, and inventory updates.

name: Segment Webhooks
description: Forward analytics events to custom destinations and trigger workflows on user actions.

name: Slack Events API
description: Build interactive Slack apps responding to messages, reactions, and workspace events.

name: PayPal Webhooks
description: Process payment authorizations, captures, refunds, and dispute events from PayPal.

name: Clerk Webhooks
description: Sync user data and respond to authentication events like sign-ups and session changes.

name: SendGrid Webhooks
description: Track email delivery events including opens, clicks, bounces, and spam reports.

name: Vercel Webhooks
description: React to deployment events, domain changes, and project updates on Vercel.

name: PlanetScale Webhooks
description: Monitor database branch operations, deploy requests, and schema changes.

name: Svix Webhooks
description: Enterprise webhook delivery infrastructure with retries, signatures, and monitoring.
